title: How to prevent myself from being dumb - Quora

response.answer_text: You can start by not thinking that you're dumb. Thinking BTW, is the key to your advancing. Have you read N. Hill's “Think and Grow Rich?”. It is not only about it making money, but thinking progressively. Speaking of reading, read material on managing your life. Also, some meditation is in order, or just centering yourself. ‘You are what you eat,” so hang with people are intelligently challenging, or stimulating. Doing the same thing over and over tends to numb the senses, depending on what that is and how often. So, break out into a new dimension, make a new winkle in your life. This may be what is needed. Thanks for the A2A.
